channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-20489|2024-09-16T18:13:18.082Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 197790.

item.title: CVE-2021-20473|2024-09-16T16:23:49.976Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway User Interface 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196944.

item.title: CVE-2021-39086|2024-09-16T19:45:45.375Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.4, and 6.1.1.0 through 6.1.1.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 215889.

item.title: CVE-2021-20552|2024-09-16T18:39:27.124Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199170.

item.title: CVE-2021-20375|2024-09-16T17:23:43.800Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated user to intercept and replace a message sent by another user due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 195567.

item.title: CVE-2020-4658|2024-09-16T19:24:09.366Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186095.

item.title: CVE-2021-20372|2024-09-16T16:34:03.285Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote authenticated user to cause a denial of another user's service due to insufficient permission checking. IBM X-Force ID: 195518.

item.title: CVE-2021-20481|2024-09-16T16:27:36.976Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 197503.

item.title: CVE-2020-4665|2024-09-16T17:38:21.113Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 2.2.6.5 and 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 186280.

item.title: CVE-2019-4423|2024-09-16T18:18:12.007Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.0.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162769.

item.title: CVE-2020-4654|2024-09-16T16:48:04.079Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information due to improper permission control. IBM X-Force ID: 186090.

item.title: CVE-2020-4259|2024-09-16T16:14:19.525Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.0.3.1 could allow an authenticated user could manipulate cookie information and remove or add modules from the cookie to access functionality not authorized to. IBM X-Force ID: 175638.

item.title: CVE-2017-1549|2024-09-16T19:20:51.437Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 131289.

item.title: CVE-2021-20563|2024-09-16T17:13:57.309Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.0.3 could allow a remote authenciated user to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially crafted request, the user could disclose a valid filepath on the server which could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199234.

item.title: CVE-2017-1497|2024-09-16T19:24:58.880Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an unauthorized user to view files they should not have access to providing they know the directory location of the file. IBM X-Force ID: 128695.

item.title: CVE-2017-1487|2024-09-16T17:03:11.451Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information such as login ids on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 128626.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-08-02T21:16:43.653Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-06-04T17:26:44.843Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.
